text: I ordered a 12pc bone in wing, an 8pc bone out wing, a large pizza, and brownie. I only recieved 8 bone in wings not 12, 33% missing but charged for 12. In my opinion, 14.99 for 8 wing pieces (equaling 4 whole wings) is outrageous. I called â€¦More
